dict.string: { "houseHoldIncomeConsent": { "description": "My household income is more than ₹25,000 per month", "ctaText": "Know more", "importantSymbol": "*" } }

{ "title" : "Are you sure you want to delete your account?\nWe wish you could have stayed longer!", "subtitle":"Please note that upon submission of this deletion request, you confirm that:", "description":[ "1. You have no outstanding credit facility availed on the ZestMoney platform. This includes payments due towards EMIs on loans, Bolt and personal loans.", "2. Your ZestMoney account will be permanently deleted. You will no longer have access to your account and any facilities associated with the ZestMoney platform.", "3. Your ZestMoney credit limit will be permanently deactivated, you will no longer be able to transact with us.", "4. You will not receive any further communication from ZestMoney, regarding promotions, sales and updates.", "5. You have no pending or potential grievances regarding your previous dealings with ZestMoney. Please ensure that all your tickets with ZestMoney are closed before proceeding any further.", "6. Please note that the rejection of your account deletion request may be impacted by multiple factors, which may include", "a. Any outstanding loans availed from ZestMoney, including but not limited to EMIs, Bolt payments and personal loans.", "b. Ongoing application towards availing of a personal loan from ZestMoney.", "c. Any pending dues towards your Bolt credit limit.", "d. In case your account has been identified under high chances of fraudulent activity. Please note that the risk calculations are completed and analysed by our internal software."], "footerTitle":"You understand that we will be required to use, disclose or retain personal data that you have shared with us if mandated by the law, rules and regulations, government officials or by any regulatory authorities with the correct authorisation to access such information. These authorities may include but are not limited to RBI, the Government of India etc. Your information may also be shared if it is imperative to complete any legal obligations or for the purpose of audit requirements.", "footerSubtitle":"Confirmation will permanently delete your ZestMoney account and you will lose access to any data associated with your ZestMoney account." }

{"title": "REGISTERED YOUR REQUEST", "subtitle": "Account deletion \nrequest submitted!", "body": "We will get back to you with an update shortly. Stay put while we collect more details required to complete your account deletion process."}

{ "accountDeletionTexts": { "title": "Account deletion", "deletionConsequences": { "title": "On submission of this deletion request, You hereby confirm that:", "consequences": [ "You have no outstanding credit facility availed on the ZestMoney platform.", "You have no pending or potential grievances in relation to any of your previous dealings with us.", "Your account will be permanently deleted. We will not be able to reactivate your account.", "Your credit limit will be deactivated.", "You will receive no further communications from ZestMoney." ] }, "description": "You understand however We will be required to use, disclose, or retain any specific data if required by law, rule, regulation, law, enforcement, governmental official, legal, or regulatory authorities and / or to such other statutory bodies who have appropriate authorisation or for the purposes of completing any legal obligations or for audit requirements. ", "primayButtonCTA": "Submit delete request" } }
